content.prompt: Which of the following hypotheses is best supported by the trends shown in this graph?

choices.label: The number of acres burned and the number of wildfires have increased since 1930 because of increased human interactions in wilderness areas.
The number of acres burned has increased since 1930 because of less public interest in preserving wild lands.
The number of wildfires has steadily decreased since 1930 because of the frequency of droughts and other effects of climate change.
The number of acres burned and the number of wildfires have decreased since 1930 because of more large-scale fire suppression interventions such as prescribed burns.

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Interpret experimental data and results in relation to a given hypothesis.
